q1: Wasn't Wayne Rooney in this team?
q2: Will Rooney continue to play for Manchester United this season?
a3: Because his age does not allow it and now he will play in the United States
q4: How old is too old to play for Manchester United?
a4: There is no such thing as to old.
q5: I wonder if they will ever change the age rule.
a5: I am not aware of any age rule for Manchester United.
